channel.title: New weapon for the original Half-Life
channel.description: Can anybody tell me how to create a weapon for the original half-Life.(Not Source, the original) I saw that there was a topic for creating a CS:Source weapon so i decided to make one for the original Half-Life. Can anybody help me or point me to a good tutorial. It cant be Source 'cause the process is different.

item.title: New weapon for the original Half-Life
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
JeffMOD:

You’ll need to make a mod with new code and new models, there is no way to implement it directly into HL1. As for tutorials,
Knock yourself out!
TWHL. For all your Goldsource (and some of your source) creation needs.
(‘Out’ would probably have your weapon tutorial, it’s the old VERC archive that TWHL saved from deletion)

Damn… And considering I have no coding experience, I guess I’m kinda screwed. and I have been on TWHL before. I’ve looked there. Nothing… Nor is there anywhere else on the internet that i can find…

Read full topic
item.source: New weapon for the original Half-Life
